name: HandyCopter
description:
HandyCopter is your virtual RC helicopter! Learn how to control it and improve your RC pilot skills to the maximum. The whole city with its roads, houses and yards is at your complete disposal!

Choose one of several RC helicopters and quadcopters with different characteristics. Complete missions, collect bonuses, pick up things and bring them to destination points. Finish all the tasks and become the best RC helicopter pilot.

HandyCopter is your chance to:

- Choose and control your own RC helicopter or quadcopter;
- Explore all lanes and alleys of the city from the bird's-eye view;
- Complete lots of missions, including fire fighting, things transporting and many others
- Become an experienced RC helicopter pilot.

Scale the highest heights controlling helicopters, like a true pilot!
